Name: Statue of Merenptah
Description: This famous king is portrayed between two gates where his names and titles are written. He is wearing a short curly wig topped with the uraeus, or royal cobra, and the Atef crown of Osiris. The king's facial features show him at a young age with a full face; his muscles are accentuated to show his strength. He is wearing a kilt with a central flap decorated with a lion's head and a richly ornamented band of uraei surmounted by sun disks
